entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
